lobby.room_created: Room created! Waiting for an opponent...
lobby.game_starting: ‚è±Ô∏è The match will start in 3 seconds...

hq.name: HQ (Headquarters)
hq.description: Main base: manages resources, vehicles and ambulances.
hq.details: Main base that manages resources, produces {maxVehicles} vehicles and has {maxAmbulances} ambulance to evacuate wounded from the front.

fob.name: FOB (Forward Operating Base)
fob.description: Advanced base that stores supplies and allows sending them to the front.
fob.details: Advanced base that can store up to {maxSupplies} supplies and manages {maxVehicles} vehicles to send resources to the front.

front.name: Front
front.description: Front advance node. Consumes supplies to push. Make sure it has more resources than the enemy front.
front.details: Front advance point. Automatically consumes supplies to push towards enemy territory. You win if you have more supplies than the enemy front.

antiDrone.name: Anti-Drone
antiDrone.description: Defense system that intercepts enemy drones, only has one projectile.
antiDrone.details: Defense system that intercepts enemy drones at a distance of {detectionRange} pixels. Only has one projectile available.

droneLauncher.name: Drone Launcher
droneLauncher.description: Unlocks the use of bomb drones in the store.
droneLauncher.details: Essential building that unlocks the ability to launch bomb drones from the store. Without this building you won't be able to use bomb drones in combat.

razorNet.name: Razor Net
razorNet.description: Defensive system that slows down and damages enemy units passing through its area.
razorNet.details: Defensive system that slows down and damages all enemy units passing through its area of effect. Effective against convoys and enemy vehicles.

truckFactory.name: Truck Factory
truckFactory.description: Increases heavy truck cargo capacity and adds one additional vehicle to the HQ.
truckFactory.details: Adds {vehicleBonus} additional vehicle to the HQ and increases heavy truck cargo capacity by {capacityBonus} units.

factory.name: Factory
factory.description: Automatically generates supplies every 3 seconds and sends them to the HQ.
factory.details: Industrial factory that generates {amount} supplies every {interval} seconds and automatically sends them to the HQ.

engineerCenter.name: Engineer Center
engineerCenter.description: Paves the road from HQ to FOBs, increasing heavy convoy speed.
engineerCenter.details: Paves the roads between HQ and FOBs, increasing heavy truck speed by {speedPercent}%.

nuclearPlant.name: Nuclear Plant
nuclearPlant.description: Generates additional passive currency per second.
nuclearPlant.details: Generates {incomeBonus}$ per second passively. Each additional plant adds more income.

machineNest.name: Trench Nest
machineNest.description: When an allied front passes over, it enters Hold mode for 10s.
machineNest.details: Fortified defensive position. When an allied Front node passes over the nest (centers coincide), the front automatically enters "Hold" mode for {holdDuration} seconds.

campaignHospital.name: Field Hospital
campaignHospital.description: Allows sending ambulances to evacuate wounded from the front.
campaignHospital.details: Allows deploying ambulances up to {actionRange} pixels away to evacuate wounded from the front. Manages {maxVehicles} ambulance.

intelRadio.name: Intelligence Radio
intelRadio.description: Returns its initial price plus an additional profit.
intelRadio.details: After {investmentTime} seconds on your side of the battlefield, it's automatically consumed and returns its cost ({cost}$) plus an additional profit of {investmentBonus}$.

intelCenter.name: Intelligence Center
intelCenter.details: Essential building that unlocks special operations units: Special Commando and Truck Assault. Without this building you won't be able to use these units in combat.

aerialBase.name: Aerial Base
aerialBase.details: Aerial base that can store up to {maxSupplies} supplies and allows helicopter deployment and refueling. Self-destructs when supplies are depleted.

vigilanceTower.name: Vigilance Tower
vigilanceTower.description: Prevents enemy commandos and sabotage in its area.
vigilanceTower.details: Defensive tower that protects an area of {detectionRadius} pixels, preventing enemies from deploying special commandos or performing sabotage within its range.

trainStation.name: Train Station
trainStation.description: Automatically sends extra supplies to FOBs periodically.
trainStation.details: Every {trainInterval} seconds, trains arrive from abroad with additional resources to allied FOBs, delivering {trainCargo} supplies per train.

droneWorkshop.name: Drone Workshop
droneWorkshop.description: Cheapens bomb drones in exchange for supplies from a nearby allied FOB.
droneWorkshop.details: Must be built within the area of at least one FOB. If it has a FOB with at least {requiredSupplies} supplies in range, it allows launching bomb drones for {discountPercent} in exchange for consuming {suppliesCost} supplies from that FOB.

vehicleWorkshop.name: Vehicle Workshop
vehicleWorkshop.description: Increases maximum and available vehicles by +1 in all nearby FOBs. Improves light truck speed by +20 px/s.
vehicleWorkshop.details: Increases maximum and available vehicles by {vehicleBonus} in all FOBs within its area of effect. Also improves light trucks (truck) from nearby FOBs, increasing their speed by +{speedBonus} px/s and updating their appearance.

physicStudies.name: Physics Studies
physicStudies.details: Improves all nuclear plants by +{nuclearPlantBonus} currency/second while there is at least one "Physics Studies" university on the field. The effect doesn't stack with other universities.

secretLaboratory.name: Secret Laboratory
secretLaboratory.details: Improves all nuclear plants by +{nuclearPlantBonus} currency/second while there is at least one secret laboratory on the field. The effect doesn't stack with other secret laboratories, but DOES stack with Physics Studies (you can have +1 from laboratory and +1 from physics studies at the same time).

trainingCamp.name: Training Camp
trainingCamp.description: Applies Vigor to your soldiers, increasing territory gain by +1.
trainingCamp.details: Training camp that applies the "Vigor" (trained) effect to all your fronts. Each front with this effect gains +{currencyBonus} currency for each territory advance.

armoredFactory.name: Armored Vehicle Factory
armoredFactory.description: Unlocks tanks, light armored vehicles and artillery.
armoredFactory.details: Military facility specialized in armored vehicles. While built and operational, unlocks the use of Tank, Light Armored and Artillery in the store. Cost: {cost}$.

deadlyBuild.name: Forbidden Construction
deadlyBuild.description: Requires Nuclear Plant, Secret Laboratory and Physics Studies on field. Unlocks "World Destroyer".
deadlyBuild.details: This highly classified construction requires having at least one Nuclear Plant, one Secret Laboratory and Physics Studies on the field to be built. Once built, it unlocks the "World Destroyer" consumable in the store.

servers.name: Servers
servers.description: Increases passive currency generation by +0.5 per second.
servers.details: Computing center that increases passive currency generation by +{incomeBonus}$ per second. Adds to base generation.

telecomsTower.name: Telecommunications Tower
telecomsTower.description: Generates +2$/s for each allied Intel Radio consumed during the match. Non-stackable.
telecomsTower.details: Communications tower that generates {baseIncomeBonus}$/s base, increasing by +{bonusPerIntelRadio}$/s for each allied Intel Radio that completed its investment during the match. Multiple towers do not stack.

drone.name: Bomb Drone
drone.description: Destroys an enemy target. Requires having a launcher on the field.
drone.details: Consumable that destroys a selected enemy building. Cost: {cost}$. Can be intercepted by enemy Anti-Drones. Requires having a Drone Launcher built to use it.

sniperStrike.name: Sniper Strike
sniperStrike.description: Applies "wounded" effect to an enemy front or eliminates an enemy shootable.
sniperStrike.details: Precise attack that can be applied to enemy fronts to cause them the "wounded" effect (doubles their supply consumption) or eliminate special commandos, truck assaults or enemy camera drones. Cost: {cost}$.

fobSabotage.name: FOB Sabotage
fobSabotage.description: Slows down convoys leaving an enemy FOB for a time.
fobSabotage.details: Sabotage that is applied to an enemy FOB, slowing down all convoys leaving that FOB for a time. Cost: {cost}$.

specopsCommando.name: Special Commando
specopsCommando.description: Disables enemy buildings within its area of effect. Requires Intelligence Center.
specopsCommando.details: Special unit deployed in enemy territory. Disables all enemy buildings within a radius of {detectionRadius} pixels. Can be eliminated by sniper attacks. Requires Intelligence Center. Cost: {cost}$.

truckAssault.name: Truck Assault
truckAssault.description: Slows down nearby enemy vehicles. Requires Intelligence Center.
truckAssault.details: Special unit deployed in enemy territory. Slows down all enemy vehicles within a radius of {detectionRadius} pixels by 25%. Requires Intelligence Center. Cost: {cost}$.

tank.name: Tank
tank.description: Armored unit that destroys enemy buildings. Cannot attack FOBs or HQs.
tank.details: Heavy armored unit that destroys selected enemy buildings. Can attack buildings but CANNOT attack FOBs or HQs. Cost: {cost}$.

lightVehicle.name: Light Armored
lightVehicle.description: Light vehicle that causes breakage in enemy buildings. Cannot attack FOBs or HQs.
lightVehicle.details: Light combat vehicle that applies "Broken" status to selected enemy buildings, disabling them until repaired. Can attack buildings but CANNOT attack FOBs or HQs. Cost: {cost}$.

artillery.name: Artillery
artillery.description: Artillery bombardment that causes breakage to all enemy buildings in the selected area. Doesn't affect FOBs or HQs.
artillery.details: Area artillery bombardment that applies "Broken" status to all enemy buildings within the area of effect. Artillery doesn't affect FOBs or HQs. Cost: {cost}$.

cameraDrone.name: Camera Drone
cameraDrone.description: Grants currency for each detected enemy light truck. Requires drone launcher.
cameraDrone.details: Surveillance drone deployed in enemy territory. Detects light trucks within a radius of {detectionRadius} pixels, granting {currencyReward}$ per detection. Allows building structures in enemy territory within a radius of {buildRadius} pixels. Can be eliminated by sniper attacks. Requires Drone Launcher. Cost: {cost}$.

worldDestroyer.name: World Destroyer
worldDestroyer.description: Ultimate weapon that sows chaos on the battlefield. Requires Forbidden Construction.
worldDestroyer.details: Weapon of mass destruction that activates after {countdownDuration} seconds. Destroys all enemy buildings on the field (except HQ and FOBs), empties all supplies from FOBs on the battlefield and empties all supplies from Front nodes. Requires having a Forbidden Construction built. Cost: {cost}$.

motorized_industry.name: Motorized Industry
motorized_industry.description: Increases speed: light trucks +50%, heavy trucks +25%, trains +10%. Sending a vehicle costs 2 currency.

improved_infrastructure.name: Improved Infrastructure
improved_infrastructure.description: For each package a factory delivers to HQ, it generates +3 currency. Factory supplies decrease by -3.

defensive_combat.name: Defensive Combat
defensive_combat.description: In Hold mode: supply consumption decreases by an additional 20% and grants +1 currency/second per front.

endeudamiento.name: Debt
endeudamiento.description: Allows spending currency below 0 down to -150. Ideal for aggressive investments during the active window.

aggressive_advance.name: Aggressive Advance
aggressive_advance.description: Nodes in advance mode increase their advance speed x2 as well as their supply consumption x2.5.
